channel.title: Open science on Sau-Chin Chen's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Open science on Sau-Chin Chen's Website

item.title: Psychological Science Podcasts
item.description: There are psychological scientists have started produce the internet podcasts since 2016. Audience will know the latest news and ideas because many hosts are open science promoters. Until now 8 podcasts are in my pocket. They are the treasure for whom want to know the true faces of scientists. Two days ago I have completed Chinese version. I wish the scientific podcasts out of English will be online in coming months.
